title: Uwaki to Honki The Animation
synopsis: Keita Sasahara's friend, Mika Kuramoto, introduced him to a close friend of hers named Riko, and they fell in love soon after. They became a happy couple, but two months into the relationship everything changedâ€”Sasahara witnessed Riko shamelessly kissing another guy. That night, he goes drinking with Kuramoto and a couple of other friends, and ends up going to her apartment.
